verses.verse: And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> me a <S%G2563>measuring<s%> <S%G2563>rod<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4464>staff;<s%> and someone <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1453>"Rise<s%> and <S%G3354>measure<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4352>worship<s%> in it.

"And <S%G1544>leave<s%> out the <S%G833>court<s%> which is <S%G1855>outside<s%> the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and do not <S%G3354>measure<s%> it, for it has been <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G1484>nations;<s%> and they will <S%G3961>tread<s%> <S%G3961>under<s%> <S%G3961>foot<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> for forty-two <S%G3376>months.<s%>

"And I will <S%G1325>grant<s%> [authority] to my <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> and they will <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> for <S%G5507>twelve<s%> <S%G1250><s%> <S%G5507>hundred<s%> <S%G1250><s%> and <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> are the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1636>olive<s%> <S%G1636>trees<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> that <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> them, <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of their <S%G4750>mouth<s%> and <S%G2719>devours<s%> their <S%G2190>enemies;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> would <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> them, in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2808>shut<s%> up the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G5205>rain<s%> may not <S%G1026>fall<s%> during the <S%G2250>days<s%> of their <S%G4394>prophesying;<s%> and they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G5204>waters<s%> to <S%G4762>turn<s%> them into <S%G129>blood,<s%> and to <S%G3960>smite<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4127>plague,<s%> as <S%G3740>often<s%> as they <S%G2309>desire.<s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> they have <S%G5055>finished<s%> their <S%G3141>testimony,<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G305>comes<s%> up out of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> with them, and <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them and <S%G615>kill<s%> them.

And their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> [will lie] in the <S%G4116>street<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4153>mystically<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> their <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And those from the <S%G2992>peoples<s%> and <S%G5443>tribes<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues<s%> and <S%G1484>nations<s%> [will] <S%G991>look<s%> at their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> for <S%G5140>three<s%> and a <S%G2255>half<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and will not <S%G863>permit<s%> their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> to be <S%G5087>laid<s%> in a <S%G3418>tomb.<s%>

And <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> [will] <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them and <S%G2165>make<s%> <S%G2165>merry;<s%> and they will <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5140>three<s%> and a <S%G2255>half<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> the <S%G4151>breath<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> into them, and they <S%G2476>stood<s%> on their <S%G4228>feet;<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> upon <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2334>beholding<s%> them.

And they <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G305>"Come<s%> up <S%G5602>here.<s%>" And they <S%G305>went<s%> up into <S%G3772>heaven<s%> in the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and their <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> them.

And in that <S%G5610>hour<s%> there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and a <S%G1182>tenth<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4098>fell;<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G3686>people<s%> <S%G444><s%> were <S%G615>killed<s%> in the <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and the <S%G3062>rest<s%> were <S%G1719>terrified<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded;<s%> and there <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> [the kingdom] of our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and of His <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and He will <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>"

And the twenty-four <S%G4245>elders,<s%> who <S%G2521>sit<s%> on their <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on their <S%G4383>faces<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We <S%G2168>give<s%> Thee <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> who <S%G1510>art<s%> and <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1510>wast,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> Thou hast <S%G2983>taken<s%> Thy <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and hast begun to <S%G936>reign.<s%>

"And the <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G3710>enraged,<s%> and Thy <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and the <S%G2540>time<s%> [came] for the <S%G3498>dead<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged,<s%> and [the time] to <S%G1325>give<s%> their <S%G3408>reward<s%> to Thy bond-servants the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and to the <S%G40>saints<s%> and to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5399>fear<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name,<s%> the <S%G3398>small<s%> and the <S%G3173>great,<s%> and to <S%G1311>destroy<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1311>destroy<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"

And the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened;<s%> and the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of His <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> in His <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and there were <S%G796>flashes<s%> of <S%G796>lightning<s%> and <S%G5456>sounds<s%> and <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%> and an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> and a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hailstorm.<s%>
